text: Narayanan Lakshmi Balakrishnan (born Velayudhan) (17 April 1943 â€“ 25 December 2014), commonly known as N. L. Balakrishnan, was an Indian movie still photographer and actor. He starred in over 70 movies. He was known for his work in Kerala Kaumudi. Balakrishnan died from cancer in a hospital in Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala, India, aged 71. ==References== ==Other websites== * *N L Balakrishnan at MSI Movie Database Category:1943 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in India Category:Indian movie actors Category:Photographers
title: N. L. Balakrishnan
